meanings.definition: Excessive levels of calcium in the blood.
meanings.sent1: The doctor diagnosed the patient with hypercalcemias after the blood test.
meanings.sent2: Hypercalcemias can lead to various health issues if not treated.
meanings.sent3: The party was full of hypercalcemias, with everyone drinking milkshakes all night long!
meanings.sent4: Her excitement over the upcoming vacation was like hypercalcemias, bubbling over uncontrollably.
meanings.sent5: The image of the overflowing cup represented hypercalcemias, illustrating the concept of excess perfectly.

meanings.definition: The condition of having abnormally high levels of calcium in the blood.
meanings.sent1: The hospital conducted tests to confirm the presence of hypercalcemias in the patient.
meanings.sent2: Hypercalcemias require careful monitoring by medical professionals.
meanings.sent3: The hypercalcemias in the town were so high that even the cows were avoiding the milk.
meanings.sent4: Her stress levels were like hypercalcemias, overwhelming her with pressure.
meanings.sent5: The painting depicted a storm of hypercalcemias, symbolizing the chaos within the body.
